title: Best of The Herd: 09/26/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/26/2019
description:
The Packers are transitioning from being Aaron Rodgers dependent team and Colin explains why.  He shockingly defends Baker Mayfield against the harsh criticism from Rex Ryan. Greg Cosell of NFL Films talks about Carson Wentz and the Eagles early struggles as well as how good Deshaun Watson is. Plus, Colin gives his three best bets in college football this weekend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
